title: Got an S+ on twisted treeline but did not get a champion token

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body:
So i got an S+ in 3v3 playing Wukong, but at the end game screen there was no token, same with in the hextech menu.
do 3v3 ratings not count or am i experiencing a bug?

Edit: Am level 5 Wukong already

replies.body: You can earn mastery points up to mastery 5 in queues other than normals and ranked, but you cannot earn mastery 6/7 tokens. Mastery 6/7 tokens are only available in normal/ranked Summoner's Rift queues.

I feel like this is not something that Riot Games should keep up. They should definitely add mastery 6/7 tokens upon twisted treeline. This would of course make it much easier and a lot faster to gain mastery though of course, but they should at least consider it.
Same happenes to me got 2 S+ on Master Yi but therw is no toke s there. What's the problem there?
